misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a seasoned competitor from Lakeside Golf Vammala, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his contemplative demeanor on the course, Mikko approaches each shot with a meticulous strategy, carefully considering every variable before executing his play.

A man of the world, Mikko's personal life is as diverse as his golf game. A notable, if somewhat less publicized, achievement is that he has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades, a testament to his zest for life and experiences.

With ten past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Mikko is a familiar face around the clubhouse. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eleventh appearance in the event, another opportunity for Mikko to leave his mark on the competition.
